form:FormGroup.label: Max Store Size
form:FormGroup.helpText: How large is this Plan B store allowed to be, e.g. 10GB.

form:FormGroup.label: Overwrite Existing Data
form:FormGroup.helpText: If subsequent data that is loaded matches an existing key then should the existing be kept or overwritten? By default PlanB will overwrite existing data.

form:FormGroup.label: Condense Data
form:FormGroup.helpText: Forget duplicate repeating temporal values and just keep the first in order to optimise the store and reduce storage. Note that some care may be needed when processing old data or when data is received late. It may be necessary to turn condense off during the time you are loading old data.

form:FormGroup.label: Condense Age
form:FormGroup.helpText: Choose how long to wait before condensing recently added data.

form:FormGroup.label: Data Retention
form:FormGroup.helpText: Determine how long to keep data or if we want to keep it forever.

form:FormGroup.label: Retain For
form:FormGroup.helpText: Choose how long to keep data for.
